stimulusHtml: A physical pendulum is made from a uniform bar with a pivot at its top end. A second physical pendulum is made from another uniform bar of twice the length, also with a pivot at its top end. How does the small-angle oscillation period of the second pendulum compare to that of the first? The rotational inertia about one end for a bar of mass M and length L is 13ML2.
choicesHtml: It is less, but more than half as much.
It is greater, but less than twice as much.
